PhysicsToolsLiteAnalysis Documentation

v3_6_3

Introduction

LiteAnalysis is a sub-package of PhysicsTools that contains many utilities that may be useful in analysis programs. In particular, it contains tools that are used by the sub-package Mkntuple.
